description: Delete a project transport plan segment set
permissions: Authorized via ProjectTransportPlanSegmentSetPolicy, delegated to the related project transport plan; user must have access to that project transport plan.
side_effects: Deletes a project transport plan segment set, nullifies related project transport plan segments and stop insertions, and refreshes assignments for the related project transport plan after commit.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument (project transport plan segment set ID). --confirm is required.
